
 TASK A, CHECK 1, Check that your decomp works as intended:

 generate a random tall (n>m) matrix A (of a modest size);
A=
0.9148 0.3439 0.9112 0.9573 
0.2269 0.4941 0.2276 0.3274 
0.2787 0.1221 0.5340 0.6341 
0.0653 0.9865 0.9037 0.6919 
0.2885 0.5213 0.2543 0.6182 
0.3420 0.4725 0.8825 0.4324 
0.0534 0.4985 0.1978 0.8356 

 factorize it into QR;
Q=
0.8445 -0.2729 -0.0460 -0.0120 
0.2094 0.2709 -0.4295 -0.3553 
0.2573 -0.0688 0.3766 0.5490 
0.0603 0.7771 0.3427 -0.1107 
0.2663 0.2559 -0.4920 0.0067 
0.3158 0.1828 0.4920 -0.2729 
0.0493 0.3803 -0.2647 0.6967 
R=
1.0832 0.7974 1.3653 1.4243 
0.0000 1.2075 0.7801 0.8765 
0.0000 0.0000 0.6279 -0.0214 
0.0000 0.0000 0.0000 0.6120 

 check that R is upper triangular;
R is upper triangular

 check that Q^T Q = 1;
Q^T * Q:
1.0000 0.0000 0.0000 0.0000 
0.0000 1.0000 0.0000 0.0000 
0.0000 0.0000 1.0000 0.0000 
0.0000 0.0000 0.0000 1.0000 
Q^T * Q is the identity matrix.

 check that QR=A;
Q * R:
0.9148 0.3439 0.9112 0.9573 
0.2269 0.4941 0.2276 0.3274 
0.2787 0.1221 0.5340 0.6341 
0.0653 0.9865 0.9037 0.6919 
0.2885 0.5213 0.2543 0.6182 
0.3420 0.4725 0.8825 0.4324 
0.0534 0.4985 0.1978 0.8356 
Q * R equals A.

 TASK A, CHECK 2, Check that you solve works as intended:

 generate a random square matrix A (of a modest size);
A=
0.4623 0.4678 0.3846 0.0466 
0.9631 0.9121 0.3373 0.4302 
0.6218 0.0341 0.8662 0.7332 
0.1060 0.5633 0.3346 0.0124 

 generate a random vector b (of the same size);
b= [0.6201140394528, 0.272495976776116, 0.621791193085625, 0.961600746475906]

 factorize A into QR;
x: [-0.929958291523752, 0.854924640045484, 1.74673689236191, -0.466647942278711]

 solve QRx=b

 check that Ax=b;
A*x= [0.6201140394528, 0.272495976776115, 0.621791193085625, 0.961600746475905]
A*x equals b.

 TASK B, CHECK, Check that you function works as intended:

 generate a random square matrix A (of a modest size);
A=
0.1705 0.5786 0.6817 0.8493 
0.3731 0.7669 0.3980 0.4424 
0.4613 0.4788 0.9039 0.7283 
0.2963 0.3920 0.8651 0.8109 

 factorize A into QR;

 calculate the inverse B;
B=
511.9352 -320.3598 718.5119 -1006.6992 
-265.5033 167.7423 -371.7107 520.3969 
-522.4517 325.3463 -726.3181 1022.0037 
498.6541 -311.1186 692.0041 -972.7907 

 check that AB=I, where I is the identity matrix;
A * B:
1.0000 0.0000 0.0000 0.0000 
0.0000 1.0000 0.0000 0.0000 
0.0000 0.0000 1.0000 0.0000 
0.0000 0.0000 0.0000 1.0000 
A * B equals I.
